p: Univariate analyses were conducted to correlate demographic characteristics with drug resistance ( Table 2). No differences were found between the prevalence of DR and gender, age at diagnosis, marriage status, infection routes, treatment duration, treatment change, and VL (all p > 0.05). CD4 + T cell count in the DR group was statistically lower than in that without the DR group ( p < 0.00). CRF01_AE and “TDF+3TC+EFV/NVP/other” are associated with DR ( p < 0.00). A logistic regression analysis showed that there was no factor significantly associated with HIVDR.
